goal: ORK Wear’s main goal is to secure complete protection against hazards in the workplace.  Utilizing up-to-date technologies, at Ork Wear, we constantly improve and broaden our product and service range.  We serve work providers with advice and assistance in the field of personal protection, providing solid and complete solutions, customized to their individual needs.  We support our clients’ employees in fulfilment of their daily responsibilities as well as protect their health and lives in critical situations. Our cloths work!
interests: Business and Industry, Communication, Competition, Consumers, Customs, Digital economy and society, Education and training, Employment and Social Affairs, Environment, Institutional affairs, International co-operation and development, Regional Policy, Research and innovation, Single market, Trade
euInitiatives: At ORK Wear, we constantly follow any EU initiatives, policies and legislative files that are related to providing and improving Health and Safety at various workplaces as well as design, testing, production, maintenance and servicing of Personal Protective Equipment, such as PPE related International, European and National Standards, their amendments as well as their drafts.
